name: Parker's Grocery
description:
Parker's Grocery is a grocery store simulator that puts you in the well worn shoes of a Parker's Partner. You're tasked with stocking the produce department with fresh fruits and veggies to pass the time until your shift is over. Welcome to Parker's!

The build from Otronicon is now available. Use a controller to play. Use the left stick to move. Press A when close to a box to pick it up. Press A when a box is in your hands to put the box down. Press B to put items on a shelf when you're holding the correct box for the items on that shelf. You can also press B to talk to customer's and coworkers. 

The game is still in a very early state, so it's very buggy. If you use a keyboard, you can press R to reset the scene. You can also use WASD to walk, Q to pick up/put down, and E to interact (like B on a controller.)
